attr.title: Undertale
attr.inst:
If you have a copy of the Undertale Linux version, copy its `game.unx`, `credits.txt`, `splash.png` and various `.ogg` files to the `ports/undertale/assets` folder.

If you don't have the Linux version, simply rename Undertale's `data.win` file into `game.unx`, and drag it and the other aforementioned files into the same folder as mentioned above.
